title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2001.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2001.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Chapter, the following terms shall have the
following meanings, unless otherwise specified: (a) Academic year means the regular school
year beginning July 1st and ending June 30th. (b) Board means the board of trustees of the

New York State Higher Education Services Corporation. (c) College shall mean an institution of
higher education recognized and approved by the Regents, which provides a
course of study leading to the granting of post-secondary degree or
diploma. (d) Commissioner means the

Commissioner of Education. (e) Corporation means the New York State Higher Education Services

Corporation. (f) President means
the president of the corporation. (g) Regents means Board of Regents of the

University of the State of New York. (h) Vocational institution means a business, trade, technical or other occupational school approved as such by the Regents
or accredited by a nationally recognized accrediting agency or association
accepted as such by the Regents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2001.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
